page.title: 20St.Johns Church
page.content: In the graveyard there are some very interesting graves.One gravestone belongs to a murderer who died on April 21st 1787.His name was William Owen.One vault belongs to the Scale family and the last Scale buried there was a doctor.Another brother from Australia had his ashes sent over and now he lies in a plot outside the church.There is also some land set aside for the burial of the ashes of people who have been cremated. We found that in the area we are covering St.John's church is the most interesting historical feature.
